title: EXCLUSIVE: Maddock Films set for horror comedy universe with 8 films lined up from 2025 to 2028; Shakti Shalini & Chamunda are 2 new entrants - PINKVILLA
summary:
Maddock Films Announces Ambitious Horror Comedy Universe with 8 Films from 2025 to 2028

Publication Date: January 02, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Maddock Films is setting the stage for an interconnected horror-comedy superhero universe over the next four years, introducing eight films from 2025 to 2028, including new titles Thama, Shakti Shalini, and Chamunda.

  • 2025 will see the release of Thama on Diwali and Shakti Shalini on December 31.
  • 2026 will bring Bhediya 2 on August 14 and Chamunda on December 4.
  • 2027 will feature Stree 3 on August 13 and Mahamunjya on December 24.
  • 2028 will culminate in the releases of Pehla Mahayudh on August 11 and Doosra Mahayudh during the Diwali period on October 18.
“Our mission at Maddock has always been to innovate and entertain... a cinematic universe that brings unforgettable characters and their stories to life like never before.” - Dinesh Vijan

Maddock Films aims to reshape the future of Hindi cinema by blending heritage with innovation through its ambitious horror-comedy universe.
newTitle: Maddock Films Announces Ambitious Horror Comedy Universe with 8 Films from 2025 to 2028

title: Hits, Misses, Super Hits, Disasters and All-Time Blockbusters: The Box Office classification and Report card of 2024 - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Hits, Misses, Super Hits, Disasters and All-Time Blockbusters: The Box Office classification and Report card of 2024

Publication Date: 2024
Source: Bollywood Hungama

The year 2024 has seen a wide range of box office performances in Bollywood, with films classified from All Time Blockbusters to Disasters based on their earnings. Notably, Munjiya stands out as a Super Hit while Bade Miyaan Chote Miyan disappoints as a Disaster.

Key Points:

  • Pushpa 2 has earned approximately Rs. 769.75 cr., making it an All Time Blockbuster.
  • Stree 2 became one of the biggest hits with Rs. 627.02 cr.
  • Munjya emerged as a sleeper hit, crossing Rs. 100 cr.
  • Bade Miyaan Chote Miyan was classified as a Disaster with earnings of only Rs. 59.17 cr.
Pushpa 2: The Rule has raked in more than any other film this year.

Overall, the classification system aids in understanding the economic landscape and viewer preferences in Bollywood.
newTitle: Box Office Report Card of 2024: Highlights and Lowlights in Bollywood

title: Justin Baldoni accuses Ryan Reynolds of ‘berating’ him for ‘fat-shaming’ Blake Lively - Hindustan Times
summary:
Justin Baldoni accuses Ryan Reynolds of ‘berating’ him for ‘fat-shaming’ Blake Lively

Date: January 02, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni has filed a $250 million libel lawsuit against the New York Times, alleging that Ryan Reynolds berated him for fat-shaming Blake Lively.

  • Baldoni claims the incident stemmed from a reasonable inquiry about Lively's weight for a lift scene due to his back issues.
  • The confrontation with Reynolds reportedly involved aggressive accusations and forced Baldoni to apologize.
  • Following the incident, Lively refused to perform the scene, causing further complications.
Baldoni said that the situation was so aggressive he felt compelled to offer repeated apologies despite his query being reasonable.

The lawsuit highlights issues of misunderstanding and aggression in Hollywood along with the implications of body image discussions in film.
newTitle: Justin Baldoni accuses Ryan Reynolds of berating him over fat-shaming claims against Blake Lively

title: Box Office New Year Record: Aamir Khan Dominates Top 10 List, Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 Strikes Shah Rukh Khan & Prabhas! - Koimoi

Allu Arjun started the new year strongly as Pushpa 2 earned 10 crore INR on its 28th day of release, making it one of the top 10 collections for a Hindi film on January 1.

  • Pushpa 2 makes 10 crore INR on January 1, 2025, ranking 8th in the top 10 first-day January box office collections.
  • Allu Arjun's film surpassed Shah Rukh Khan’s Dunki and Prabhas's Salaar, both of which had a box-office clash on December 21, 2023.
  • Aamir Khan leads the top 10 list with four films, including Dangal, PK, 3 Idiots, and Dhoom 3.

title: After Bollywood's biggest dud The Lady Killer, Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar reunite for Mere Husband Ki Biwi - Hindustan Times
summary:
Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar Reunite for Mere Husband Ki Biwi

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 by: Devansh Sharma

Actors Arjun Kapoor, Bhumi Pednekar, and Rakul Preet Singh will share the screen in a film titled "Mere Husband Ki Biwi" after their previous collaboration in the poorly received film "The Lady Killer".

  • The upcoming film is set to be released on February 21, 2025.
  • A playful announcement on Instagram describes the film's love story as unique: "Yahaan pyaar ki geometry thodi twisted hai - kyunki ye love triangle nahi, pura circle hai!"
  • The film will be directed by Mudassar Aziz, known for his work on films like "Khel Khel Mein" and "Pati Patni Aur Woh".
  • The film's producers include Vashu Bhagnani, Jackky Bhagnani, and Deepshikha Deshmukh.
  • Arjun and Bhumi's last film, "The Lady Killer," was a commercial failure, earning only ₹60,000 against a budget of ₹45 crore.
“It's lighthearted, relatable, and full of moments that will stay with you long after you leave the theater,” said director Mudassar Aziz.

In summary, the reunion of Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar aims to create a better reception from audiences, following their last film's disappointing performance.
newTitle: Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar Reunite for New Film After The Lady Killer's Failure

title: Identity Review | Tovino Thomas Starrer Is Expensive, Expansive and Excessively Complicated - Lensmen Reviews
summary:
Identity Review | Expensive, Expansive and Excessively Complicated

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 | Source: Lensmen Reviews

The review discusses the latest film 'Identity', highlighting both its ambitious scope and intricate plot that tends to overcomplicate a seemingly simple story.

  • The story revolves around Haran Shankar, a character with an abusive past and unique skills as a sketch artist.
  • As Haran interacts with his police officer neighbor and a witness with face blindness, the narrative unfolds in unexpected ways.
  • The film is noted for its detailed research but suffers from excessive exposition that diminishes the impact of plot twists.
  • Director’s choices in cinematography and pacing received praise, especially during action sequences.
  • The review suggests that the film's ambitions could have benefited from a more refined screenplay.
“A bit more refinement on a writing level would have made Identity a quality film by all means.”

In conclusion, while 'Identity' showcases ambitious filmmaking and intriguing concepts, its overly complicated storyline ultimately detracts from the viewer's experience.
newTitle: Identity Review: Ambitious Yet Overcomplicated

title: Made for ₹160 crore, earned just ₹47 crore, how Varun Dhawan's Baby John became 2024's final box office disaster - Hindustan Times
summary:
Varun Dhawan's Baby John: 2024's Final Box Office Disaster

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Varun Dhawan starrer, Baby John, has failed to impress at the box office, earning only ₹47 crore against its ₹160 crore budget. Despite high expectations due to its mass action genre, the film opened poorly and received negative reviews.

  • Released with a budget of ₹160 crore, Baby John has grossed just ₹47 crore globally.
  • The film opened to a disappointing ₹12 crore on its first day.
  • Negative reviews and poor word of mouth contributed to its decline in viewership.
  • Trade insiders predict total losses could reach ₹100 crore.
“Baby John fell the hardest. Its failure may cause Bollywood makers to realize that merely formula will not help a film soar if everything else is hollow.”

This film represents a significant failure for Varun Dhawan and may signal a need for change in the Bollywood mass action genre.
newTitle: Varun Dhawan's Baby John: 2024's Final Box Office Disaster

title: These two CBFC objections for Game Changer raise questions - 123telugu
summary:
These two CBFC objections for Game Changer raise questions

Published on: Jan 2, 2025 Source: 123telugu.com

The grand arrival of Game Changer, a highly anticipated political drama directed by Shankar Shanmugam, is just around the corner, set to release on January 10, 2025.

  • The movie has been granted a U/A certificate by the CBFC with a runtime of 2 hours and 45 minutes.
  • CBFC objections include the requirement for the movie's title to be presented in Telugu and the exclusion of the honorific 'Padmasree' before Brahmanandam's name.
  • The concerns prompt questions about inconsistencies with previous films like Prabhas’ Kalki 2898 AD.
  • The objections may relate to past controversies surrounding the misuse of award titles by actors, including a directive from the Andhra Pradesh High Court.
“It remains to be seen who will provide clarity on these matters.”

As the film's release approaches, the clarity regarding these objections is eagerly awaited by audiences.
newTitle: CBFC Objections on Game Changer Raise Questions

title: Boney Kapoor says Allu Arjun was 'unnecessarily dragged' into Pushpa 2 stampede case: 'It was only because of the crowd' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Boney Kapoor has said that it was wrong to drag Allu Arjun in the Sandhya Theatre stampede case, adding that the death of the fan happened due to the crowd.

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Boney Kapoor defended Telugu star Allu Arjun concerning his legal troubles following a tragic stampede that resulted in a fan's death at the premiere of Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Boney Kapoor criticized the allegations against Allu Arjun, asserting they were unfounded.
  • He emphasized that the tragedy was due to the overwhelming crowd and not Arjun's actions.
  • On December 4, prior to the film’s release, the stampede led to the death of a 35-year-old woman.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested on charges of culpable homicide but was granted bail the following day.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule has grossed ₹1760 crore globally, becoming a major box office success.
“It was only because of the crowd that had gathered to see the film.” - Boney Kapoor

This incident highlights the dangers of massive fan gatherings and the responsibilities of celebrities in such situations. The ongoing investigation will determine the future implications for Allu Arjun and the cinema industry.
newTitle: Boney Kapoor Supports Allu Arjun Amidst Stampede Controversy
